mapper.select: select distinct m.perms from t_role r left join t_user_role ur on (r.role_id = ur.role_id) left join t_user u on (u.user_id = ur.user_id) left join t_role_menu rm on (rm.role_id = r.role_id) left join t_menu m on (m.id = rm.menu_id) where u.username = #{userName} and m.perms is not null and m.perms <> ''

select m.* from t_menu m where m.type <> 1 and m.id in (select distinct rm.menu_id from t_role_menu rm left join t_role r on (rm.role_id = r.role_id) left join t_user_role ur on (ur.role_id = r.role_id) left join t_user u on (u.user_id = ur.user_id) where u.username = #{userName}) order by m.order_num
SELECT m.id, m.parent_id, m.`name`, m.component, m.keep_alive, m.hidden, m.title, m.perms, m.type, m.path FROM t_menu m where m.parent_id = 0 ORDER BY order_num
SELECT m.id, m.parent_id, m.`name`, m.component, m.keep_alive, m.hidden, m.title, m.perms, m.type, m.path FROM t_menu m WHERE parent_id = #{id}
